left.description: Indicate the donor's disease status at time of follow-up.

right.name: disease_status_at_followup

left.name: relapse_interval
left.description: Time interval between end of primary treatment and disease progression (in days)

meta.notes: If the donor was clinically disease free following primary treatment and then relapse or recurrence or progression (for liquid tumours) occurred afterwards, then this field will indicate the length of disease free interval, in days.

right.description: If the donor was clinically disease free following primary treatment and then relapse or recurrence or progression (for liquid tumours) occurred afterwards, then this field will indicate the length of disease free interval, in days.
right.name: relapse_interval

meta.notes: This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.

description.data: If the donor was clinically disease free following primary treatment and then relapse or recurrence or progression (for liquid tumours) occurred afterwards, then this field will indicate the length of disease free interval, in days.

notes.data: This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.

left.name: program_id
left.description: Unique identifier of the CQDG program.

data.name: program_id
data.description: Unique identifier of the CQDG program.

left.name: submitter_donor_id
left.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

data.name: submitter_donor_id
data.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

left.name: smoking_status
left.description: Smoking status of a patient at the time of the data collection.

data.name: smoking_status
data.description: Smoking status of a patient at the time of the data collection.

left.name: smoking_pack_years
left.description: Number of packs of cigarette multiplied by the number of cigarettes smoked

meta.notes: Pack-years is calculated by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes smoked per day by the number of years the person has smoked. For example, 1 pack year is equal to smoking 1 pack per day for 1 year

data.name: smoking_pack_years
data.description: Number of packs of cigarette multiplied by the number of cigarettes smoked

meta.notes: Pack-years is calculated by multiplying the number of packs of cigarettes smoked per day by the number of years the person has smoked. For example, 1 pack year is equal to smoking 1 pack per day for 1 year

left.name: alcohol_status
left.description: Alcohol consumtion based on recommended daily limit

codeList: Alcohol intake within recommended daily limit
Alcohol intake exceeds recommended daily limit

meta.notes: Refer to the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, for men, no more than 15 drinks a week, with no more than 3 drinks a day most days. No more than 4 drinks on any single occasion. For women, no more than 10 drinks a week, with no more than 2 drinks a day most days. No more than 3 drinks on any single occasion.

data.name: alcohol_status
data.description: Alcohol consumtion based on recommended daily limit

codeList: Alcohol intake within recommended daily limit
Alcohol intake exceeds recommended daily limit

meta.notes: Refer to the Canadian Centre on Substance Abuse, for men, no more than 15 drinks a week, with no more than 3 drinks a day most days. No more than 4 drinks on any single occasion. For women, no more than 10 drinks a week, with no more than 2 drinks a day most days. No more than 3 drinks on any single occasion.

left.name: alcohol_consumption_duration
left.description: Indicate the duration of time, in years, that the donor has consumed alcohol.

data.name: alcohol_consumption_duration
data.description: Indicate the duration of time, in years, that the donor has consumed alcohol.

right.description: Interval of how long the donor has survived since primary diagnosis, in days.
right.name: survival_time

meta.notes: Survival_time is only required to be submitted if the donor's vital_status is Deceased.

data.description: Interval of how long the donor has survived since primary diagnosis, in days.

right.name: primary_site
right.description: The text term used to describe the primary site of disease, as categorized by the World Health Organization's (WHO) International Classification of Diseases for Oncology (ICD-O). This categorization groups cases into general categories.

codeList: Bones, joints and articular cartilage of limbs
Bones, joints and articular cartilage of other and unspecified sites
Connective, subcutaneous and other soft tissues
Other and ill-defined sites in lip, oral cavity and pharynx
Other and ill-defined sites within respiratory system and intrathoracic organs
Other and unspecified female genital organs
Other and unspecified major salivary glands
Other and unspecified male genital organs
Other and unspecified parts of biliary tract
Other and unspecified parts of mouth
Other and unspecified parts of tongue
Other endocrine glands and related structures
Peripheral nerves and autonomic nervous system
Spinal cord, cranial nerves, and other parts of central nervous system

data.description: The text term used to describe the primary site of disease, as categorized by the World Health Organization's (WHO) International Classification of Diseases for Oncology (ICD-O). This categorization groups cases into general categories.

right.description: Interval from the primary diagnosis date to the follow-up date, in days.
right.name: interval_of_followup

meta.notes: The associated primary diagnosis is used as the reference point for this interval. To calculate this, find the number of days since the date of primary diagnosis.

data.description: Interval from the primary diagnosis date to the follow-up date, in days.
data.name: interval_of_followup

meta.notes: The associated primary diagnosis is used as the reference point for this interval. To calculate this, find the number of days since the date of primary diagnosis.

right.name: submitter_primary_diagnosis_id
right.description: Indicate if the follow-up is related to a specific primary diagnosis event in the clinical timeline.

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

data.name: submitter_primary_diagnosis_id
data.description: Indicate if the follow-up is related to a specific primary diagnosis event in the clinical timeline.

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

right.name: submitter_treatment_id
right.description: Indicate if the follow-up is related to a specific treatment event in the clinical timeline.

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

data.name: submitter_treatment_id
data.description: Indicate if the follow-up is related to a specific treatment event in the clinical timeline.

meta.notes: To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

meta.notes: This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.

right.description: Indicate the method(s) used to confirm the donor's progression or relapse or recurrence disease status. (Codelist reference: NCI CDE ID: 6161031)
right.name: method_of_progression_status

codeList: Biomarker in liquid biopsy (e.g. tumour marker in blood or urine)

meta.notes:
This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.
To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

data.description: Indicate the method(s) used to confirm the donor's progression or relapse or recurrence disease status. (Codelist reference: NCI CDE ID: 6161031)
data.name: method_of_progression_status

codeList: Biomarker in liquid biopsy (e.g. tumour marker in blood or urine)

meta.notes:
This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.
To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

right.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic site where disease progression, relapse or recurrence occurred, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3). Refer to the ICD-O-3 manual for guidelines at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344.
right.name: anatomic_site_progression_or_recurrences

meta.notes: This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.

data.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic site where disease progression, relapse or recurrence occurred, according to the International Classification of Diseases for Oncology, 3rd Edition (WHO ICD-O-3). Refer to the ICD-O-3 manual for guidelines at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344.
data.name: anatomic_site_progression_or_recurrences

meta.notes: This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.

right.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer at time of retreatment for recurrence or disease progression. This may be represented as rTNM in the medical report.
right.name: recurrence_tumour_staging_system

meta.notes: This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.

data.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer at time of retreatment for recurrence or disease progression. This may be represented as rTNM in the medical report.
data.name: recurrence_tumour_staging_system

meta.notes: This field is required to be submitted if disease_status_at_followup indicates a state of progression, relapse, or recurrence.

right.name: recurrence_t_category
right.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected recurrence_tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

data.name: recurrence_t_category
data.description: The code to represent the extent of the primary tumour (T) based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected recurrence_tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

right.name: recurrence_n_category
right.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected recurrence_tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

data.name: recurrence_n_category
data.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the regional lymph node (N) involvement for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected recurrence_tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

right.name: recurrence_m_category
right.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected recurrence_tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

data.name: recurrence_m_category
data.description: The code to represent the stage of cancer defined by the extent of the distant metastasis (M) for the cancer based on evidence obtained from clinical assessment parameters determined at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression, according to criteria based on multiple editions of the AJCC's Cancer Staging Manual.

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected recurrence_tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.

right.name: recurrence_stage_group
right.description: The code to represent the stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting recurrence_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.) at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression.

meta.notes:
This field is dependent on the selected recurrence_tumour_staging_system.
Please refer to the documentation for Tumour Staging Classifications: http://docs.icgc-argo.org/docs/submission/dictionary-overview#tumour-staging-classifications

data.name: recurrence_stage_group
data.description: The code to represent the stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting recurrence_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.) at the time of retreatment for a recurrence or disease progression.

meta.notes:
This field is dependent on the selected recurrence_tumour_staging_system.
Please refer to the documentation for Tumour Staging Classifications: http://docs.icgc-argo.org/docs/submission/dictionary-overview#tumour-staging-classifications

right.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery. This may be represented as ypTNM or ycTNM in the medical report.
right.name: posttherapy_tumour_staging_system

data.description: Specify the tumour staging system used to stage the cancer after treatment for patients receiving systemic and/or radiation therapy alone or as a component of their initial treatment, or as neoadjuvant therapy before planned surgery. This may be represented as ypTNM or ycTNM in the medical report.
data.name: posttherapy_tumour_staging_system

meta.notes: This field is required only if the selected posttherapy_tumour_staging_system is any edition of the AJCC cancer staging system.
